commit.message:
g++.exp (g++_include_flags): Tweak path to testsuite_flags.


2003-06-17  Benjamin Kosnik  <bkoz@redhat.com>

	* lib/g++.exp (g++_include_flags): Tweak path to testsuite_flags.
	Remove cruft.

From-SVN: r68134
